Transubstantiation defended and prov'd from Scripture in answer to the first part of a treatise intitled, A discourse against transubstantiation. Gother, John, d. 1704.
[24], 64, [2] p.
Printed by Henry Hills ..., London : 1687.
In reply to a pamphlet by John Tillotson, Archbishop of Canterbury. Attributed to John Gother. Cf. BM. Errata: p. [23]. Reproduction of original in Newberry Library. Marginal notes.
=======
